attributes.title: Nithyananda on Yoga Sutras: Importance of Enlightened Master in Correct Understanding
attributes.description: In this first part of the discourse, Paramahamsa Nithyananda describes the importance of an enlightened Master to give the correct understanding. A simple change of meaning of a single word can change the whole understanding and only an enlightened master can give the correct understanding. Watch Part 2 (to be uploaded soon) of this discourse, wherein never-before-heard or seen description of the working of the mind is presented by Paramahamsa Nithyananda followed by a meditation technique.
